name: Dress Top
description: Let your little one shine in this cute and comfortable kids' top dress. Made from soft, breathable fabric that's gentle on the skin and perfect for all-day wear. Features playful colors, fun prints, and easy-to-wear designs kids will love. Ideal for birthdays, play dates, or everyday fun and style. A perfect blend of fashion, comfort, and joy for your child's wardrobe.
